Cursed, Cursed Creator! Why did I lif live why in that instant did I not extinguish the spark of existence which you had so wantonly bestowed? I know not — Despair had not yet taken possession of me it w I was enragedmy feelings were those of rage & revenge — I wcould with plea sure of torn ha ve destroyed the cottage and its inhabitants, and glutted my self with their shrieks & misery.They AsWhen night came on I quitted my retreat and wandered to the wood. — And now No longer restrained by the fear of discovery I gave vent to my anguish in fearful howlings. I was like a wild beast in the toils; Tearingthe objects that obstructed me with and fearranging through the wood with stag like swiftness. Oh! What a miserable night I passed. the cold stars shone in mockery, the bare trees waved their branches above me and now and then the sweet voice of a bird burst forth anidst <<<<<<< HEAD the universal stillness. — All ‸save Iwere ======= the universal stillness. — All save Iwere >>>>>>> 87997420fb09408d0ce3612dbbbe3a20a90323fa at rest or in enjoyment but I.
